data.quote: It's impossible to avoid hurting someone's feelings, but it is possible to avoid hurting them physically.
data.author: Renz Pajarito

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
data.author: William Butler Yeats

data.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
data.author: Albert Schweitzer

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
data.author: Vidal Sassoon

data.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
data.author: Walt Whitman

data.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
data.author: William James

data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
data.author: Herman Melville

data.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
data.author: Colin R. Davis

data.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember—the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
data.author: Estée Lauder

data.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
data.author: Conrad Hilton

data.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
data.author: Colin Powell

data.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma—which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
data.author: Mae West

data.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: My mama always said, life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
data.author: Forrest Gump

data.quote: Watch your thoughts; they become words. Watch your words; they become actions. Watch your actions; they become habits. Watch your habits; they become character. Watch your character; it becomes your destiny.
data.author: Lao-Tze

data.quote: When we do the best we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life or the life of another.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: The healthiest response to life is joy.
data.author: Deepak Chopra

data.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
data.author: Sarah Louise Delany

data.quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
data.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

data.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
data.author: Robert Byrne

data.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
data.author: Bob Marley

data.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
data.author: Brian Tracy
